definition: Jokhang, main Buddhist temple in Lhasa, a sacred place of Tibetan Buddhism
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
bright/clear/manifest/to show clearly
Buddhist temple/mosque/government office (old)

sentences.english: There is a rare silver Buddha and many musical instruments in Dazhao Temple.
sentences.chinese: 大昭寺有珍奇的銀佛和許多樂器。

sentences.english: Jokhang Temple , Barkor Market Street and Potola Palace . stay in Lhasa city ;
sentences.chinese: 參觀大昭寺，八郭街，布達拉宮。

sentences.english: The gilded bronze-tile roof of Jokhang Temple and Potala Palace in distance.
sentences.chinese: 大昭寺鎏金銅瓦頂和遠處的布達拉宮。

sentences.english: Now let me introduce the Dazhao Temple to you .
sentences.chinese: 我來介紹一下大昭寺吧。

sentences.english: D4 Visit Potala Palace, Jokhang Temple and Barkhor Street.
sentences.chinese: 參觀布達拉宮，大昭寺和八角街。

sentences.english: And then we went to Dazhao Temple.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們又去了大昭寺。

sentences.english: Pilgrims coming from afar visiting Jokhang Temple.
sentences.chinese: 許多人從很遠的地方到大昭寺轉經。
